name: Amazon Perfect Width - Not Too Wide
description: It's probably just me but Amazon is too wide for my non-widescreen (square shaped) 17 inch monitor, which means a horizontal scroll-bar appears on most Amazon pages for no real reason. Maybe I should set my monitor to a higher pixel ratio but I don't want to. This simple style merely makes Amazon fit on your screen, without a horizontal scroll bar. The scroll bar is superfluous, it doesn't really show any extra info except some blank space, so good riddance. I think the Amazon site (CSS) is badly designed. This style applies to all Amazon sites around the world.
